forward proxy

forward proxy acts as a middlemen between client and servers, so despite multiple clients requesting for the response from the server, it appears as if the request only comes from a single endpoint ie ip address.
so all the client request are mapped to a single ip address and sent to the server so that the server can not know which ip originally sent the request.

not only that forward proxy can be used to cache some of the most used website, 
eg in a college if we commonly use c++ compiler website then that website can be cached and be loaded very fast or even without internet.

they are also used to implement policies, eg for entire nation india-> it's isp or internet service providers can set up bans on some websites, eg the ticktok ban. 
which can be implemented based on forward proxies.
